DOC.brief_summary: Working hypothesis aim : The aim study investigate whether vitamin D deficiency could cause increased thrombin generation hypercoagulable state healthy volunteer . Methods : In total 400 healthy volunteer plan inclusion trial . After sign informed consent two blood sample obtain participant . Expected result : invastigator expect find volunteer vitamin D deficiency thrombin generation curve compatible hypercoagulable state return normal treatment vitamin D
DOC.brief_title: Does Deficiency Vitamin D Induced Hypercoagulation Thrombin Generation
DOC.criteria: age > 18 healthy naive drug treatment exc criterion
